name: q1-spotify
description: > ðŸŽ§ An audio visualizer made using web-audio API and javascript. You can upload a local Mp3 file and the visualizer will analyze the frequencies and make the bars bounce accordingly. I included 3 themes; warm, cool, and red/green, able to be selected below the visualizer. At the bottom of the page is a from you can fill out with artist names in a comma separated list and hitting create will generate a Spotify playlist made at random using the artist names provided.
